text: Euphorbia emirnensis is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is found in Comoros, Madagascar, and Mayotte. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical high-altitude grassland. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== emirnensis Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by John Gilbert Baker
title: Euphorbia emirnensis
